colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BDAG CAG KHA BA RI PA'I SKYABS GCIG 'PHAGS MCHOG PHYAG NA PADMO MI'I GAR GYIS RNAM PAR ROL BA ^RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN CING GZIGS PA CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, SKU TSE DU MAR RGYAL BSTAN 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM GYI MTHU GRUB PA BSIL LJONGS CHOS SRID GNYIS LDAN GYI BDAG PO BKA' DRIN ZLA MED ZHVA SER BSTAN PA 'DZIN BYED DPAL LDAN 'E YO NO MIN HAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG PO'I BKAS BSKUL BA LTAR, ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RVA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MON HAN DU 'BOD PA BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS SER BYES GRVA KHANG THOG TU DANG BAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
